item.title: Slayer Tower?
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

Hmmm need some help in slayer tower …

if (type == 1616) { if (playerLevel[18] < 1) { sM("You must be level 1 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if (type == 1637) { if (playerLevel[18] < 10) { sM("You must be level 10 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if (type == 1626) { if (playerLevel[18] < 20) { sM("You must be level 20 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if (type == 1624) { if (playerLevel[18] < 35) { sM("You must be level 35 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if (type == 1615) { if (playerLevel[18] < 45) { sM("You must be level 45 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if (type == 1613) { if (playerLevel[18] < 55) { sM("You must be level 55 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }

Hmm see there are levels and other things … but theres a problem…i kill one monster from slayer tower and i dont recive slayer exp…how can i fix that ??? Any idea?

Thanks

Read full topic
